oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Stanley. M.L. Stanley label.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Lenoir City School of Arts and Crafts, Commercial and Portrait Photography, M.L. Stanley, Proprietor. Lenoir City, Tenn
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Label on back of photograph of unidentified group (probably including Robert Crye, Greenback, TN): Lenoir City School of Arts and Crafts, Commercial and Portrait Photography, M.L. Stanley, Proprietor. Lenoir City, Tenn. 1904.
